A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Everyone is going to go into this movie with different expectations. 

Without putting any spoilers in\, there were some parts of the movie that had plot holes and some characters did not develop as well as they should have. There are also parts of the movie where characters take a turn that I was not expecting and\, in my opinion\, turned out well. There are many new ideas that develop in this movie that seem like they will be answered in episode IX.

There definitely could have been more improvements\, but fairly solid film. I did not go in trying to compare it to any previous films.
